sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_pd_lane</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Unique Lane Name Per Process Definition</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) { if (current.operation() == "insert" || !current.getValue("name")) new PDNameGenerator().generateNameFromLabel(["process_definition"]); else if (current.name.changes()) { var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_pd_lane"); gr.addQuery("name", current.name); gr.addQuery("process_definition", current.process_definition); gr.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", current.sys_id); gr.query();
//Aborts update if the name is already in use if (gr.hasNext()) { gs.addErrorMessage( gs.getMessage('A lane with the name "{0}" already exists.', current.name)); current.setAbortAction(true); } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-08 23:04:11</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>181f18640f9600108c87f4f0ff767e9c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Unique Lane Name Per Process Definition</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_181f18640f9600108c87f4f0ff767e9c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-02-27 16:40:14</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=181f18640f9600108c87f4f0ff767e9c"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Unique Lane Name Per Process Definition
